TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DebugConvert extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.JScript.IDebugConvert, class Microsoft.JScript.IDebugConvert2

Docs.summary: Converts data from one type to another. Includes methods that convert values to <xref:System.String> objects so that they can be displayed by the debugger.
